SetupTraits.Name: Kin
SetupTraits.Description:
Folk are Kin.
• Motivations: Kin usually fight for their ideals, usually to protect something they care about (even if that something is something as simple as their own survival).
• Flee: Folk value their own lives and will usually surrender or flee if there's no chance of winning a fight. Martial-minded cultures like Islanders, Leggio, or Guilders might put up more of a fight.
